price: 77. (Eh bien), ce sont tous là pour moi des ennemis, excepté le Seigneur de l’Univers,
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
